Functions

00200_RSA_CRT
[Secure_API_Crypto_Algorithms]

Involved Components and their required Functionality More...

Functions

 TestCase_GC00100_RsaCrtNopadDecrypt1024MalformedKey ()
 TestCase_GC00300_RsaCrtNopadDecrypt1024Bd20MalformedKeyElements ()
 TestCase_GC00400_RsaCrtNopadDecrypt1024Bd10MalformedKeyElements ()

Detailed Description

Involved Components and their required Functionality

  1. ClientLib
    1. Can connect to daemon
    2. Can reserve memory for connection
  2. McDriverDaemon
    1. Daemon running
    2. Daemon socket accessible by TLC
    3. mcOpenDevice()
  3. McDriverModule
    1. Module loaded
    2. Module socket accessible by daemon
    3. Module listens for connection
  4. Trusted Application TlIntegrationTest
    1. Trusted Application copied to Android on Test device in registry as 05010000000000000000000000000000.trst
    2. Trusted Application runnable and bug-free

Function Documentation

TestCase_GC00100_RsaCrtNopadDecrypt1024MalformedKey (  )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
05010000000000000000000000000000
Pre Conditions:
Involved components running and functioning
Focus:
Decrypt RSA CRT (1024 bit)
Test Steps:
The test ensures that malformed keys have not been processed.
Verification:
Function returns TLAPI_OK and encrypted data matches test vector.
Test output is OK.
Post Conditions:
none
Manual Execution:
No
Trustonic Test Suite Testcase:
No
Final Device Testcase:
Yes
Extensive Testcase:
Yes
Basic Testcase:
No
Quick Testcase:

TestCase_GC00300_RsaCrtNopadDecrypt1024Bd20MalformedKeyElements (  )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
none
Pre Conditions:
Involved components running and functioning
Focus:
Decrypt RSA CRT (1024 bit)
Test Steps:
  • bit difference 20
    • Q length 63 byte
    • P length 66 byte We expect key initiation to fail due to malformat.
Verification:
Function returns E_TLAPI_INVALID_INPUT and encrypted data matches test vector.
Test output is OK.
Post Conditions:
none
Manual Execution:
No

No

Yes

Yes
